text: Ezɨma Saimon Pita, ko a ko itir darasi, me osirir me inizir kabar ganigha kamaghɨn dɨgavir kuram gami. Saimonɨn roroamning Jems ko Jon, Sebedin otarimning. Aning Saimon ko ingarir gumazimning, aning uaghan dɨgavir kuram gami. Kamaghɨn amizɨma Saimon kamaghɨn ganigha, tevimning apɨrigha Iesusɨn suemningɨn boroghɨn irɨ. Egha ghaze, “Ekiam, kɨ gumazir arazir kurabagh amim! Kamaghɨn amizɨma nɨ na ategh mangɨ.” Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn Saimonɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ atiatingan markɨ, datɨrɨghɨn tugh mangɨ, nɨ gumaziba iniam.”
